attributes.title: useless
attributes.review: I downloaded thIs app to see if there is any reason I can find for trump to be president again and there wasn't AT ALL he has not done any of the promises that he said he would and only made life harder for us people he is just as useless as his app and both have to GO!!!

attributes.title: Little bunker boy
attributes.review: This app is the worst thing to ever be created. It makes absolutely no sense. It says trump is a great president when he has made the economy worse, only spends money on military. It is very clear that he has absolutely no idea what he is doing. So he’s hinting in his little bunker cause he scared of some children. Donald Trump is PATHETIC

attributes.title: Super glitchy and gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: I had a lot of faith in this app considering it is the official Trump 2020 app, but when I first downloaded it it kept crashing. After I downloaded it, I noticed all my apps were crashing and it seemed like I was hacked. Deleting the app semi solved the problems

attributes.title: Bad, Bad, Bad
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see of there was a good reason to like trump, but this app is bad. it takes forever to download and it takes a while to.. Do anything actually. Don’t buy this app! It asks u for what is ur Phone num. They can hack into ur phone if they do this. Don’t get this app. Terrible. Horrible. BAD.

attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review: I got this app excited to be able to help my community and gain knowledge only to be disappointed. I was told that he would have games and movies on this app and I was looking forward to seeing Hamilton I was disappointed 0/10 Disney plus for the win.

attributes.title: App was horrible 🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: It was so buggy and it had some kind of Cheeto 😷On the front page👻 I thought this was about the president but I just got a child that looked like a cheeto💩 and it didnt give me any good facts on weather this man was worthy enough to be president 🤒I just got facts of a person that should be in office🥱😴🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Black lives water
attributes.review: So I was  downloading this app that are beautifully president 🍊made but it kept on crashing and after that I kept on dreaming about this guy he was🟠one of the worst thing that has ever happened to me I am soo concern if people have gotten nightmares because of this app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE.
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I was expecting it to load just fine because our president should know enough to make it work well with all his money. Instead, it glitched and the app crashed. DISAPPOINTED AND A WASTE OF TIME. I’m starting to think about switching sides. I no longer support trump 2020. Goodbye

attributes.title: Need to be fixed or app needs to be taken down
attributes.review: This app is really bad because you can’t vote or anything if this is going to be a app about trump can we at least vote or something or say something so trump can get it and I hate that I have to  download it  twice.

I downloaded the app and when they ask you language, they don’t have enchantment table!! How dare they exclude my people?! I deleted right away of course, but how could they do that? I’m lucky enough to know English as well but some people don’t. It’s just plain out rude and disrespectful 😡😡😡
